titleStmt.title: A full answer to the Second defense of the exposition of the doctrin of the Church of England in a letter to the defender.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Joseph, d. 1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ... and are to be sold at his printing-house ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Johnston by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
The "Second defense" was written by William Wake--cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
